name: Stair Falling 3D: Evil Torture
description:
This big world is cruel to a little ragdoll... All sentiments aside! Prepare for DESTRUCTION! If you are constantly tired, annoyed and feel stressed, it means that you should relieve the stress and choose the way to relax.

Hit the ragdoll and make it fall downstairs as far as possible for maximum damage!

CHOOSE ONE OF THE RAGDOLL CHARACTERS:
Who do you want to kick down the stairs today?

PLAY ON DIFFERENT LOCATIONS:
Even if you never noticed, all stairs are quite different.

STRONG STRESS RELIEF EFFECT:
Push the ragdoll and see it falling, more damage - more fun.

REALISTIC PHYSICS OF FALLING BODY:
Seems like you hear bones breaking sounds...

Enjoy our ragdoll falling simulator, a perfect entertainment for all fans of destruction games!
